title: Dragonslayer Xin Zhao
body:
As a Xin main, I am very happy with this skin, usually I am not a big fan of skins, but there is a lot of smaller details that make this skin great. 

the noise that your AAs make while Q is active is pretty addictive, it also makes it easier to keep track of the 3rd proc, which helps, though its not hard to count to 3. this skin with the bork rework has revitalized my faith in Xin, he has been out of flavor for a while, and though not back to the monster he was, he is definitely more viable now than he has been. Also the chromas are awesome.

Good job skin team, you've been on a hot streak of badass skins lately between lux, GP, zyra, xin, and a lot of others, I feel like you guys are really putting out quality work, so ty.
